title: Creating Change in New York's Forgotten Borough
description: Producer Betsy Nagler speaks with Democratic activist and organizer, Lorie Honor, one of the founding members of Staten Island Women Who March, who's now running for Staten Island Borough President. They discuss how Lorie got involved in activism, what she seeks to accomplish as Borough President, and where she sees New York's most conservative borough heading now that we are (hopefully) in the Post-Trump era.
